s: The Cobbler’s Choice laces are quite thick & soft, (too thick for some eyelets & speed hooks,) very tough & feel great. They stay tied & resist melting & haven’t snapped yet. I’ve used Diamond & Iron Laces, & pretty much al the Kevlar reinforced brands.
